title: HONEYSEW No-Hassle Triangles
features: Cut, mark and stitch This versatile gauge takes the place of five separate notions: "T" gague Hem gague Circle compass Buttonhole spacer
description: The HONEYSEW No-Hassle Triangles Gauge allows you to effortlessly cut,mark, and stitch to create 1/2 -square or 1/4- square triangle blocks withoutever cutting triangles or guessing at the sizes. Use No-Hassle Gauge to make 5 block sizes for both 1/2- and 1/4- square triangles. Create 2-1/2" (64mm), 3-1/2" (89mm), 4-1/2" (114mm), 5-1/2" (140mm) and 6-1/2" (165mm). Reference the left side of the gauge for 1/2-square triangles and the right side for 1/4-square triangles. The sliding gauge locks for accuracy.
details: {"Product Dimensions": "14.17 x 0.39 x 3.94 inches", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Item Weight": "1.44 ounces", "Manufacturer": "HONEYSEW", "Date First Available": "February 27, 2017"}
